intent_atoms.description: Child boxes must not exceed parent ranges and overlapping payloads are disallowed.
Hardware focus shortcuts should flow through a shared catalog and Focus command menu so macOS and iPadOS expose the same key bindings and restore focus targets without pointer input.
When schema updates are intentional, snapshots and CLI fixtures must be refreshed via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests.

functional_units.name: Parent Containment Validation
functional_units.description: Ensures child boxes cannot exceed parent ranges and flags overlapping payloads for CLI/UI surfaces.

functional_units.name: Accessibility & Keyboard Shortcuts Integration
functional_units.description: Provides shared catalog of hardware focus shortcuts and Focus command menu to expose consistent key bindings across macOS and iPadOS, restoring focus targets without pointer input.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing Management
functional_units.description: Manages licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG-H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads and refresh regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Refresh
functional_units.description: Automates refreshing of snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur via environment variable and test command.
